body: If I get an alt can I transfer my gold to the alt cause I may make one soon for fresh stats?
body_tagged: If I get an alt can I transfer my gold to the alt cause I may make one soon for fresh stats?
title: Question

replies.body: If you get an alternate account, and it's your only, you may transfer your donor rank. However you can't split it (Emerald+).
replies.body_tagged: If you get an alternate account, and it's your only, you may transfer your donor rank. However you can't split it (Emerald+).
